description.value:
This dirty metal wand is covered in an oily acrid smelling film.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell}

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Grease]{Grease}, but the grease is caustic. If you cast this spell on an area, any creature that fails their Reflex save and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}, or that begins their turn prone, takes [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage. If you cast this spell on an unattended object, the first creature to pick up the object during the duration takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}. If you cast this spell on an attended object and the holder or wielder fails their Acrobatics or Reflex save, the holder or wielder takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}. If you cast this spell on a worn object, any creature who @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple}s or Grabs the wearer takes [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid damage}.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of grease
